# Insert it!\ntree_array.push_back(data)\nsize += 1\n\n# Move it up! (if needed)\nindex = tree_array.size()\nwhile index > 0 and tree_array[index].data > tree_array[parent(index)].data do\n\tswap(tree_array[index], tree_array[parent(index)])\n\tindex = parent(index)\n\nreturn\n\n\n\n# Helpermethod to calculate the index of the parent\nfunc parent(index) -> int:\n\treturn floor((index - 1) / 2)\n
